name: IconPackager Theme File
summary: Learn about .ICONPACKAGE files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: ICONPACKAGE files are bundled with several .ICO files or a single .ICL file. They can also be included inside compressed IconPackager .IP files.
NOTE: IconPackager introduced the ".iconpackage" file extension for raw themes beginning with IconPackager 5. Previously, raw themes used the .IPTHEME extension.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
